name: You Are A Knight
description:
From Oliver Joyce, the creator of the one of the most-played RPGs in history, Swords and Sandals, this action packed game sets you out on a grand adventure in King Arthur's world of knights. You start out as a beginner knight and by the end of the game you will grow into one of the greatest in the realm! You will fight other knights, joust, go on quests and get into all sorts of chivalrous mischief in this light-hearted adventure. Just like in Swords and Sandals it's a perfect blend of athleticism and silliness.

So, come make a knight of your own and visit the wondrous lands Oliver has created. Soon the acts of fighting, jousting and performing good deeds will become part of your daily routine. Believe in yourself, embrace the chivalrous life and enjoy the new worlds you have conquered for You Are A Knight!

"A good example of what games should be like. Wicked laugh, great fighting and genuine affection for your character. You almost feel proud of the little fella when he wins a fight. It's a long struggle to be top of the ranks so plenty of money's worth." -- Stumpjay

Here are some of the features of the game;

* Fast paced, turn-based combat -- just like Swords and Sandals.
* Fight, joust, go fishing, perform noble deeds on your journey to knighthood
* Go on over 60 quests and attract followers such as The Vampire, The Baker and The Silver Stag
* Buy weapons, armor, potions and magical items from four different shops
* Over 170 achievements to earn and collect
* Fifteen tournaments featuring great historically awesome knights like William Wallace and Richard the Lionheart
* Build up your knight through 50 character levels and learn powerful abilities like 'Cleave' and 'Smite'
